hadiths.text: This tradition has also been transmitted through a different chain of narrators by Jabir b. 'Abd Allah. This version adds:He (the Prophet) turned to the people and said: When one of you comes (on Friday) while the imam is preaching, he should pray two rak'ahs and make them short

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا دَخَلَ الرَّجُلُ وَالإِمَامُ يَخْطُبُ
chapter.eng-name: If A Person Enters While The Imam Is Delivering The Khutbah
